name: Malkuth: The Scrapheap Awakening
flavor: “The Vessel stirs in the valley of dead matter. The first breath is thick with the scent of clay.”
rule: Primal Inertia: The first Stall (Undershoot) of this Chapter does not penalize the draw phase.

name: Malkuth: The Whispering Mire
flavor: “A thick, acidic fog clings to the Golem’s joints. Visibility is low, and every step requires precise thermal management.”
rule: Acidic Haze: A player cannot refill their hand if they play an Acid (Green) card, even if the group succeeds or they match the suit.

name: Malkuth: The Shattered Ascent
flavor: “The path turns vertical. Gravity is a constant enemy, and the Golem must divert all power to its joints.”
rule: Gravitational Pull: If no player matches the Terrain suit during a Pulse, the group must immediately add +1 Friction as the Golem struggles to maintain its position.

name: Yesod: The Lunar Reflection
flavor: “The Vessel gazes into the mirror of the moon. Reality ripples as the subconscious takes form.”
rule: Astral Feedback: Using the Akashic Reservoir (Swap) generates +2 Friction instead of 1.

name: Yesod: The Astral Crossing
flavor: “The silver cord stretches thin. Every movement requires a leap of faith across the void.”
rule: The Scroll of Raziel: A second Reservoir is manifest. Additionally, the Blind Leap persists: manifest cards face-down before the Sphere’s Law is revealed.

name: Yesod: The Weaving of Dreams
flavor: “The Demiurge weaves a web of illusions. To stall is to become entangled in the threads of sleep.”
rule: Entangling Dreams: If the group Stalls (Undershoots), every player must discard one card from their awareness.

name: Hod: The Geometric Order
flavor: “The Demiurge tests the Vessel with rigid patterns. In the hall of geometry, only symmetry allows the spirit to pass.”
rule: Symmetric Vibration: If the total vibration is an Even number, reduce Friction by 1 (Minimum 0). If it is Odd, add +1 Friction.
rewards: Sigil Draft: reveal 3 Tier-1 Sigils, choose 1.

name: Hod: The Unforgiving Logic
flavor: “A cold, crystalline architecture where there is no room for hesitation. Here, Apathy is as destructive as Pride.”
rule: Binary Consequence: Any Stall (Undershoot) result is considered as a Pride (Overshoot).
rewards: Sigil Draft: reveal 3 Tier-1 Sigils, choose 1.

name: Hod: The Forbidden Prism
flavor: “Reason demands the exclusion of the unknown. In the halls of pure intellect, the shifting nature of the Prism is considered heresy.”
rule: The Labyrinth of Definition: Prism (Jolly) cards lose their variable nature; they are treated as fixed value 0 and provide no Suit resonance.
rewards: Sigil Draft: reveal 3 Tier-1 Sigils, choose 1.

name: Netzach: The Thicket of False Victories
flavor: “Nature thrives on competition, not cooperation. In this thicket, only the dominant faculty finds the strength to persist.”
rule: The Hollow Victory: On a Success, only the player who contributed the highest value card refills their hand. Others only refill if they matched the Resonant Suit.

name: Netzach: The Forge of Unending Desire
flavor: “The fire of passion is boundless and destructive. Without the stabilizing flow of the Astral Waters (Ether) or the shifting essence of the Prism, the vessel will melt under its own heat.”
rule: Ethereal Containment: At the end of every Pulse, add +1 Friction unless at least two Ether (Blue) or Prism (Jolly) cards were manifested in the sum.

name: Netzach: The Storm of Shattered Selves
flavor: “The storm seeks to dissolve the individual into the whole. To align too closely with the environment or the collective memory is to lose one's distinct awareness.”
rule: Shattered Identity: The Resonance Rule does not apply in this location.
